item.title: Joyce add a quote by Robert Wilensky
item.description: "We've all heard that a million monkeys banging on a million typewriters will eventually reproduce the entire works of Shakespeare. Now, thanks to the Internet, we know this is not true." -- Robert Wilensky

item.title: Joyce add a quote by THOMAS JEFFERSON
item.description: "But friendship is precious, not only in the shade but in the sunshine of life; & thanks to a benevolent arrangement of things, the greater part of life is sunshine. I will recur for proof to the days we have lately passed. On these indeed the sun shone brightly." -- THOMAS JEFFERSON

item.title: Joyce add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "For three things I thank God every day of my life: thanks that he has vouchsafed me knowledge of his works; deep thanks that he has set in my darkness the lamp of faith; deep, deepest thanks that I have another life to look forward to--a life joyous with light and flowers and heavenly song." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Joyce add a quote by Albert Schweitzer
item.description: "In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit." -- Albert Schweitzer

item.title: Joyce add a quote by Moses Hadas
item.description: "Thank you for sending me a copy of your book. I'll waste no time reading it." -- Moses Hadas

item.title: Joyce add a quote by Thomas Hayden
item.description: "Thanks to evolution, half of all Americans don't believe in evolution." -- Thomas Hayden

item.title: Joyce add a quote by St. Teresa of Avila
item.description: "Thank God for the things that I do not own." -- St. Teresa of Avila

item.title: Joyce add a quote by Willie Nelson
item.description: "God has blessed you richly, so get down on your knees and thank him. Don’t forget the less fortunate or God will personally kick your ass. I’d love to do it for him, but I can’t be everywhere." -- Willie Nelson
